statements: SELECT * FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule LIMIT 10;
SELECT loan_id, principal, payment_amount FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE term > 12;
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate, payment_date FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE principal < 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule ORDER BY payment_date ASC, principal DESC;
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' AND payment_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE principal > 10000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT loan_id, principal, term FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE interest_rate < 5.5 ORDER BY term ASC;
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT loan_id, principal, interest_rate FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE term = 12 AND payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY principal DESC;
SELECT AVG(principal), MAX(interest_rate), MIN(payment_amount) FROM LoanAmortizationSchedule WHERE term = 24;
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AmortizationSchedule WHERE schedule_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, start_date FROM LoanDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanDetails WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM LoanDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS average_interest_rate FROM LoanDetails
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, start_date FROM LoanDetails WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanDetails GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(loan_amount) > 10000
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanDetails;
SELECT * FROM PaymentDetails LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM PaymentDetails ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, schedule_date, remaining_principal FROM ScheduleDetails WHERE loan_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, duration_months FROM LoanDetails WHERE interest_rate > 0.05;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount, principal_amount FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT loan_id, SUM(principal_amount) AS total_principal_paid, SUM(interest_amount) AS total_interest_paid FROM PaymentDetails GROUP BY loan_id HAVING total_interest_paid > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ScheduleDetails WHERE remaining_principal < 500 OR remaining_interest < 100 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedule WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT plan_id, loan_id, installment_number, installment_date FROM payment_plan WHERE installment_number <= 5;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount, remaining_balance FROM payment_history WHERE loan_id = 'f7135701-85d6-42a7-aa70-2291ae60e99a';
SELECT * FROM loan WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, payment_amount ASC;
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate FROM loan WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT loan_id FROM payment_schedule WHERE total_payment > 5000 AND payment_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, remaining_balance FROM payment_history WHERE loan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND payment_amount < remaining_balance;
SELECT loan_id, SUM(principal_payment) AS total_principal_paid FROM payment_schedule GROUP BY loan_id HAVING total_principal_paid > 50000 ORDER BY total_principal_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_amortization;
SELECT loan_id, principal, term_months FROM loan_amortization;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_schedule ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, daily_interest FROM interest_schedule WHERE loan_id = 101;
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, balance FROM remaining_balance WHERE balance <= 0;
SELECT * FROM loan_amortization WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_schedule WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, SUM(daily_interest) AS total_interest FROM interest_schedule GROUP BY loan_id HAVING total_interest > 500;
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, balance FROM remaining_balance WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, total_amount FROM total_paid ORDER BY total_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
